ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:3}); // Tseng
“Oh, I've been tricked.”
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:0, u3:0, u4:1, aplitude:0, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // {Cloud}
“Let's put the Keystone in.”
fade({r:0, g:160, b:40, speed:64, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:160, b:40, speed:16, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:160, g:160, b:160, speed:64, type:6, adjust:0});
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:1, u3:4, u4:16, aplitude:0, speed:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:4}); // Tseng
“It's not the Promised Land…
Sephiroth's searching for…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:7}); // Tseng
“Damn…”{PAUSE}“Letting {Aeris} go was the start…
of my…bad luck…”{PAUSE}“The President…
was wrong…”

dialogStrings:
Tseng
“It's not the Promised Land…
Sephiroth's searching for…”

Tseng
“Damn…”{PAUSE}“Letting {Aeris} go was the start…
of my…bad luck…”{PAUSE}“The President…
was wrong…”

{Aeris}
“You're wrong.”{PAUSE}“The Promised Land isn't like
what you imagined.”

{Aeris}
“And, I'm not going to help.”{PAUSE}“Either way, there was no way
Shinra could have won.”

Tseng
“…Pretty harsh.
Sounds like something…
you'd say.”

{Aeris}
“…Tseng's with our enemy, the Turks,
but I've known him since we were little…”{PAUSE}“There's not a lot of people I can say that about.
In fact, there are probably only a handful
of people in the world who really know me.”
